name: Marta Complex Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Whose anniversary is the family celebrating in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Lindsay and Tobias'.

	Michael tricked Lucille into having an anniversary party for Lindsay by suggesting that she hold a Valentines Day party.  At the party, Michael tries to suppress his feelings for Marta, Gob's girlfriend, who he'd become attracted to over the previous two weeks.

questions.text: Who does Tobias spend the anniversary party with?
questions.explanation:
Carl Weathers.

	In the previous episode, "Public Relations", Tobias met Carl on his way to the airport.  When he was supposed to take a flight to Boston to renew his medical license, he was actually taking $1,100 acting lessons from Carl Weathers.  During the party, Tobias wants more information, but Carl keeps talking about making stew.

questions.text: Who gives the toast during the anniversary party?
questions.explanation:
Michael.

	During the toast, Michael congratulates his parents, Buster and Lucille 2, Lindsay and Tobias, and Gob and Marta.  At the very end, Michael slips up in his speech and accidentally says that he loves Marta.  Although not everybody realized it, Marta did, and she realizes that she actually wanted to be with Michael.

questions.text: Lucille listened to Buster's conversation with Michael over the phone.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Buster was angry with Lucille for setting up his girlfriend, Lucille 2, with Carl Weathers.  During the conversation, Michael accidentally overhears Lucille on the line and she tries to cover it up by pretending she was just dialing the phone.

questions.text: What is the name of the man that Gob thinks Marta is sleeping with?
questions.explanation:
Hermano.

	Gob thinks that Marta is cheating on him because she's demonstrating the signs that he had when he was cheating on her with 'The Legs' in the episode "Storming the Castle".  Michael assures Gob that Marta isn't cheating on Gob at all.  Gob listened into a conversation that Marta was having with her mother in Spanish, and he thought that Hermano was the name of the man she was with, but in Spanish, Hermano translates to brother.

questions.text: Who is the first person that Buster talks to when he emancipates himself from his mother?
questions.explanation:
Carl Weathers.

	After packing up his belongings, Buster heads across the hall to move in with Lucille Austero, but when he knocks on the door, Carl answers.  Lucille ends up telling Buster to leave to think about what's going on with the situation, so he leaves.  Lucille is more worried about living alone than Buster's conditions.

questions.text: What is the name of the set of religious films that George Sr. creates?
questions.explanation:
Caged Wisdom.

	In the beginning of the episode, during the party, George Sr. sends the tape to the family, but later in the episode, he pressures Lucille into taking one to watch when she visits him in prison.  She as well as the rest of the family thinks that the movies are stupid, and that George Sr. is acting foolish.

questions.text: What is the role that Carl Weathers gets Tobias an audition for?
questions.explanation:
Frightened Inmate #2.

	Tobias tells this to Buster when he arrives at the model home with his belongings.  Tobias attempts to capture the role throughout the next few episodes.  Also, Buster realizes that Marta is the most beautiful woman he's ever seen when she arrives at the house looking for Michael.

questions.text: When Lindsay considers separating from Tobias, she tells Maeby to move into her room.  Where does Tobias sleep?
questions.explanation:
In George Michael's room.

	After listening to Michael's speech, Lindsay considers divorcing Tobias, but she finally decides to just have him sleep in George Michael's room for a while.  When Maeby is in Lindsay's room, she tries to get Lindsay to fess up about Tobias' and her relationship.

questions.text: Tobias gets his role in a movie.
questions.explanation:
True.

	When Tobias gets the role, Lucille realizes that she might get used to living alone.  Meanwhile, Michael discovers that the gift Marta bought was actually a tuxedo for him, and that Hermano means brother.  The story basically continues in the next episode, "Beef Consommé".
